common.upload_failed: We couldn't upload all feedbacks. Please try again later.

start-survey.placeholder-message:
Sorry for the inconvenience.
Please come back and check later on.

survey.mandatory: Oops! You Forgot To Answer This Question
survey.idle-warning: Do you want to continue the survey?
survey.metadata-anonymous-warning: Personal information will not be shared.
survey.error-hint-required-all: Please answer all of these labels
survey.error-hint-least-one: Please answer at least one of these labels
survey.hippa-hint: The information you share will be safe and protected under HIPAA. Only authorized people will have access to it, so your privacy is ensured.

metadata-question-desc.Name: e.g. John Doe / Please type Name only
metadata-question-desc.Email: e.g. test@test.com / Please type Email only
metadata-question-desc.Date: e.g. 2020/03/19 or 2020-03-19 / Please type Date only
metadata-question-desc.String: e.g. Hello123! / Please type Text only

end-survey.thank: Thank you for taking our survey
